Questions and answers

What's "Screen Protection"?

"Screen Protection" — is a service that guarantees the repairs or replacement of the screen (the display unit or its element) if it's damaged.
The repairs are done in a certified service centre, so you can be sure they are high-quality.

How do I activate the service?

To activate the service, you need to download the "Screen Protection" app at Google Play or App Store and check the screen for damage. Phones that support the "Screen Protection" app:
- Android ver. 4.1 or later;
- iOS ver. 9 or later.

What do I do if the screen is damaged?

If it's damaged, you only need to dial 5911 for support line and follow the instructions.

How do I get the login and password for my personal account?

You can get the login and password by calling the support line at 5911. The information will be sent to the e-mail specified at registration.

What's the address of the service centre?

"Krok-TTC", 25B Raduzhna St., 02218, Kyiv, Ukraine. Work hours: Mon. to Fr. 9 a.m. till 8 p.m., Sat, 10 a.m. till 6 p.m., Sun. – closed.

Who pays for the phone delivery?

The delivery to the service centre is paid by the subscriber. The delivery from the service centre is paid by the service centre.

What are the terms of the repairs?

The standard term for the repairs is 7 calendar days, excluding the delivery terms. In some cases it may take more than 7 days.

What happens if the cost of repairs exceed the reimbursement sum?

The lacking sum will need to be paid to the account of the service centre. The replenishment can be made through your personal account.

When is reimbursement paid?

The reimbursement will be provided based on the results of the diagnostics in the following cases:
the smartphone cannot be repaired;
some spare parts are lacking;
the term of repairs exceeds 30 business days.
The reimbursement will be made to a bank card according to the subscription, excluding the sum of diagnostics (100 UAH).

May I use the service on several numbers?

The service works for one number on one smartphone (a unique IMEI)

How do I disconnect the service?

To disable the service, dial *591#

What is the term of the service?

The service is valid for 12 month from its activation

Why do I need a personal account?

You need your personal account to:

view the information on the user's personal data,
view the information on the connected device and subscription type,
view the sum paid for the service,
track the request for repairs and pay the extra sum, if necessary,
load the photo of the phone and the documents if the screen is damaged

Lifecell LLC reserves the right to set and change tariffs (rate (tariff ?) plans) for its services, in accordance with the Law "On Telecommunications" dated November 18, 2003, 1280-IV, change the list of such Services, as well as change the conditions and terms of the Promotion , prematurely terminate, suspend the date of its unilaterally in accordance with the Terms and Procedure for the provision of telecommunication services of LLC Lifecell.
